original_text: But the Lord was kind to them and he helped them. He loved them because of his covenant with their ancestors, Abraham, Isaac and Jacob. So he has never wanted to destroy them or to send them away from him, even until now.
korean_text: 여호와께서 아브라함과 이삭과 야곱과 더불어 세우신 언약 때문에 이스라엘에게 은혜를 베풀며 그들을 불쌍히 여기시며 돌보사 멸하기를 즐겨하지 아니하시고 이 때까지 자기 앞에서 쫓아내지 아니하셨더라

sentences.original_text: But the Lord was kind to them
because of his covenant with their ancestors
So he has never wanted to destroy them
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그는 그들을 멸망시키기를 원하지 않았고

sentences.original_text: or to send them away from him
sentences.korean_translation: 또 그들에게서 멀리 보내기를 원하지 않았다
